name: Flaming Friday Night
description:
Synopsis: Main Story
"Flaming Friday Night" is fictitious story about the two criminals who do motiveless murder.
And the ordinary citizen, Ena Rain(player) is in mortal danger from them.
Ena must survive the murderers to save her life herself.



Spin-off: Thirteen Murderers
The murderers have just increased two to thirteen.

Spin-off: Doppelganger
Ena has just encountered doppelganger.
Ena must survive doppelganger because she's gonna try to kill her.

Spin-off: Zombified Criminals
The criminals have been infected Zombie virus. Ena must escape the city.

Spin-off: Kingpin
The penguin mascot costume is wandering with a fire axe on Friday night.




The stories contain elements which are about horror and gore.

note. If player presses 'ESC' key while playing, the player will go to the main index.
